title: Anime Low Poly Tourist Character 3D
description: Meet the Anime Low Poly Tourist, your ideal anime character for games! Featuring an elegant Hawaiian shirt, comfy shorts, and a relaxed vibe. Perfect for artistic, lightweight game designs with various animations. Ideal for beach scenes or adventures.
longDescription:
Introducing the Anime Low Poly Tourist, your ultimate anime character for games! This character comes fully equipped with an elegant Hawaiian shirt, comfortable shorts, and a relaxed attitude. With its anime style and low poly design, it is ideal for games seeking an artistic and lightweight look. Additionally, it includes various animations, making it perfect for a variety of projects. Whether you're creating a relaxing beach scene or an exciting adventure, the Anime Low Poly Tourist is the ideal addition to your game. Available now on the Epic Games Store!


This character is from the main pack available at https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/6d4e393aacf04e5a8e28d0c8de39a147"
technicalDetails:
Technical Details

Features:

Number of characters: 1 single character, the same as in the image

Lowpoly aesthetic: Characterized by simplified lowpoly shapes.

Vibrant Color Palette: Features a vibrant color palette that enhances the characters' visual appeal and brings them to life.

Optimized Performance: Optimized for all platforms.

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes

Animated: Yes

Number of Animations: 7

Animation types: In-place

Number of characters: 1

Vertex counts of characters: Verts 1,972 - Tris 3,788

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 2 Material and 6 Instances

Number of Textures: 6

Texture Resolutions:

4 128x128 (Pixel Art)

2 textures in 256x256 (Pixel Art)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


Documentation: Documentation 3D CHARACTERS | UNREAL ENGINE

This character is from the main pack available at https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/6d4e393aacf04e5a8e28d0c8de39a147"


Important/Additional Notes: Low-polygon anime-style characters with pixel art textures, designed for mobile games. They are configured to work with Unreal mannequin animations using retargeting, with foot IK and collision set up.
